content.ui.intro: ModularBot for WhatsApp, by Everton R. Colombo.
content.ui.ask.masterAgent: Master User (admin's number or contact name):
content.bot.commands.noPermission: You do not have permission the execute that command!
content.bot.commands.listModules.name: modules
content.bot.commands.removeModule.name: remove
content.bot.commands.removeModule.description: Removes _<MODULE-NAME>_ from the active modules list, stopping its execution
content.bot.commands.help.name: help
content.bot.commands.help.description: Lists all available commands and their descriptions
content.bot.commands.displayHierarchy.name: hierarchy
content.bot.commands.displayHierarchy.descriptio: Lists all users whose access level has been required at some point and their current access levels
content.bot.commands.promote.name: promote
content.bot.commands.promote.content.success: @%s's access level has been successfully updated to *%s*
content.bot.commands.promote.content.failure.not: You can only change the access level of someone lower down the hierarchy than you!
content.bot.commands.shutdown.name: shutdown
